name: Blackout (itch) (SyrusDev)
description:
You awaken in a dark facility that seems to assume you volunteered in a dangerous programme which goal is to test new scientific inventions ; the main one being the possibility to shift the direction of the gravity of some objects.

Blackout is a 3D dark sci-fi puzzle game in which players must think differently to solve new types of problems revolving around gravity. The game is composed of an introduction accessible by clicking "New Game" on the main menu. Note : clicking "New Game" will lock the all the levels except for level 1. The levels unlock when you access them normally by finishing the previous level.

Try and complete all the 6 levels! Don't hesitate to give feedbacks in the comments or to message me on discord (Syrus#3234).
